paragraphs.content: The Gospel According to St Matthew
paragraphs.contentHtml: <small>The Gospel According to</small> St Matthew

paragraphs.content: Chapter 1
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 1

paragraphs.content: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.

paragraphs.content: Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren;

paragraphs.content: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar; and Phares begat Esrom; and Esrom begat Aram;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar; and Phares begat Esrom; and Esrom begat Aram;

paragraphs.content: And Aram begat Aminadab; and Aminadab begat Naasson; and Naasson begat Salmon;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Aram begat Aminadab; and Aminadab begat Naasson; and Naasson begat Salmon;

paragraphs.content: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth; and Obed begat Jesse;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth; and Obed begat Jesse;

paragraphs.content: And Jesse begat David the king; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Jesse begat David the king; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias;

paragraphs.content: And Solomon begat Roboam; and Roboam begat Abia; and Abia begat Asa;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Solomon begat Roboam; and Roboam begat Abia; and Abia begat Asa;

paragraphs.content: And Asa begat Josaphat; and Josaphat begat Joram; and Joram begat Ozias;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Asa begat Josaphat; and Josaphat begat Joram; and Joram begat Ozias;

paragraphs.content: And Ozias begat Joatham; and Joatham begat Achaz; and Achaz begat Ezekias;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Ozias begat Joatham; and Joatham begat Achaz; and Achaz begat Ezekias;

paragraphs.content: And Ezekias begat Manasses; and Manasses begat Amon; and Amon begat Josias;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Ezekias begat Manasses; and Manasses begat Amon; and Amon begat Josias;

paragraphs.content: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren, about the time they were carried away to Babylon:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren, about the time they were carried away to Babylon:

paragraphs.content: And after they were brought to Babylon, Jechonias begat Salathiel; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And after they were brought to Babylon, Jechonias begat Salathiel; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel;

paragraphs.content: And Zorobabel begat Abiud; and Abiud begat Eliakim; and Eliakim begat Azor;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Zorobabel begat Abiud; and Abiud begat Eliakim; and Eliakim begat Azor;

paragraphs.content: And Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;

paragraphs.content: And Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;

paragraphs.content: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.

paragraphs.content: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.

paragraphs.content: Then Joseph her husband, being a just man, and not willing to make her a publick example, was minded to put her away privily.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then Joseph her husband, being a just man, and not willing to make her a publick example, was minded to put her away privily.

paragraphs.content: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.

paragraphs.content: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name Jesus: for he shall save his people from their sins.

paragraphs.content: Now all this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now all this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,

paragraphs.content: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.

paragraphs.content: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:

paragraphs.content: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son: and he called his name JESUS.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son: and he called his name Jesus.
